sentence.Network_en: I thought my answer was correct, but it was erroneous.
sentence.Network_cn: 我原以为我的答案是对的, 可结果却是错的.

sentence.Network_en: The newspaper published a retraction of the erroneous report.
sentence.Network_cn: 那家报纸声明撤回那篇错误的报道.

sentence.Network_en: Proper measures were taken as soon as the erroneous ideas cropped up.
sentence.Network_cn: 错误思想一冒头,就及时采取了措施.

list.abs: In no circumstances should erroneous ideas be allowed to spread unchecked., 决不允许错误思想到处泛滥.
...err object Err物件erroneous execution错误性执行error错误.
erratum 错字erroneous correlation 不正确的对比error analysis 误差分析
away from the erroneous zone of broad band salary ., 走出宽带薪酬的误区.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin erroneus (from erro(n-) 'vagabond', from errare 'to stray, err') + -ous

entry.def: Beliefs, opinions, or methods that are erroneous are incorrect or only partly correct.

example.ex: Some people have the erroneous notion that one can contract AIDS by giving blood...
example.tran: 一些人错误地认为献血会让人感染艾滋病。

example.ex: They have arrived at some erroneous conclusions.
example.tran: 他们得出了一些错误的结论。

stems_affixes.word_buile: ab离开+errant[adj.错误的,脱离正途的]→离开[正确]走向错误
err漫游,犯错误+ant表形容词→adj.错误的,脱离正途的
err漫游,犯错误+atic表形容词→被人认为错误的→古怪的
err漫游,犯错误+oneous……的→adj.错误的,不正确的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 离开正路,脱离常规,色差
stems_affixes.word_buile: aberrant[[adj.越轨的,异常的]]驶鷑.离开正路,脱离常规,色差
err漫游,犯错误+atum表名词→[改正]错误得东西→正误表
err漫游,犯错误+or表名词→n.错误,过失
in无+err漫游,犯错误+ancy表名词→无错误
err漫游,犯错误→v.犯错误,出差错
